original_text: But Onesiphorus has stayed to help me. I pray that the Lord will be kind to his family. He often came to help me not to be sad. I am in prison, but he was not ashamed to help me.
korean_text: 원하건대 주께서 오네시보로의 집에 긍휼을 베푸시옵소서 그가 나를 자주 격려해 주고 내가 사슬에 매인 것을 부끄러워하지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: But Onesiphorus has stayed to help me
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 오네시보로는 나를 돕기 위해 남아있었습니다

sentences.original_text: I pray that the Lord will be kind to his family
He often came to help me
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자주 나를 돕기 위해 왔습니다

sentences.original_text: but he was not ashamed to help me
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 나를 돕는 것을 부끄러워하지 않았습니다
